column3:
「野生馬手なずけ選手権」2位の
フッサレンから勝負を挑まれた！

『野生馬を2分以内に馬宿まで連れてくる』

野生馬は警戒心が強い
この勝負…一筋縄ではいかなさそうだが
再度挑戦することにした
column4:
Rensa, famous for taking second place at
the Hyrule Horse-Taming Competition, has
thrown down the gauntlet!

His challenge: ride a wild horse to the stable
withintwo minutes.

Wild horses are very wary of people, so this
will be no mean feat. This isn't your first time
accepting his challenge.

column3:
「野生馬手なずけ選手権」2位の
フッサレンから勝負を挑まれた！

『野生馬を2分以内に馬宿まで連れてくる』

野生馬は警戒心が強い
この勝負…一筋縄ではいかなさそうだ
column4:
Rensa, famous for taking second place at
the Hyrule Horse-Taming Competition, has
thrown down the gauntlet!

His challenge: ride a wild horse to the stable
withintwo minutes.

Wild horses are very wary of people, so this
will be no mean feat.

column3:
『野生馬を2分以内に馬宿まで連れてくる』

フッサレンから挑まれた この勝負

野生馬は警戒心が強く
時間内に連れてくることは容易ではなさそうだ
野生馬の扱いに詳しい人がいれば
アドバイスをもらいたいところなのだが…
column4:
Rensa's challenge: ride a wild horse to the
stable withintwo minutes.

Wild horses are very wary of people, so this
will be no mean feat. It would be nice if there
was someone around the stables who could
offer you some advice on dealing with them...

column3:
野生馬を時間内に馬宿まで連れてきた！

「野生馬手なずけ選手権」2位の
フッサレンは記録を抜かれ悔しそうだ
column4:
You rode a wild horse to the stable before time
ran out!

Rensa looks a little put out to have been
dethroned in the Hyrule Horse-Taming
Competition.

column3:
野生馬手なずけ選手権」2位の
フッサレンから勝負を挑まれた！

『野生馬を2分以内に馬宿まで連れてくる』

野生馬は手に入れた！
後はフッサレンのもとに戻るだけ
column4:
Rensa, famous for taking second place at
the Hyrule Horse-Taming Competition, has
thrown down the gauntlet!

His challenge: ride a wild horse to the stable
withintwo minutes.

You caught a wild horse! Now you just need to
get it back to Rensa in time.
